title: Foot Powder Wins In A Landslide, And Other Unsavory Election Trivia
teaser: Heading into the midterm elections, NPR's Scott Simon talks to know-it-all AJ Jacobs about some old voting tricks, such as getting the citizens smashed before they cast their ballots.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
